__e: The boy's a prison escapee, a fugitive and yet you think nothing of giving him $15 cash, plus a car?
Look -- why don't you ride along with me, and if things go as I expect, you'll have your fugitive, and I'll have my killer.
You gave our money away. I'm a fugitive. You're an Amber alert.
To be a fugitive's hard enough when you're healthy.
I only wanna make sure the fugitive is brought back alive.
You're not a fugitive are you?
[ Robot ] Your Honor, I have new evidence... to present to the court: the escaped convict, who will tell exactly what happened.
And, even more than that, a fugitive who must not be caught.
We got this fugitive who's been hiding out here for, like, seven months now.
If your private party happens to be a fugitive from justice... then it is my business.
But as you may know, I am now a fugitive from justice.
I just don't know if I have the nerve, you know, to take all the money and go down to Mexico and then be on the run from the law and who knows what else will come up out of this.
Harboring a fugitive of the law, that's what y'all are doing.
I just don't know if I have the nerve, you know, to take all the money and go down to Mexico and then be on the run from the law and who knows what else will come up out of this.
What, are you a murderer? You escape from prison or something?
We got an 80-year-old fugitive in the back a runaway in the front, man.
Hey, it's not every day that we wrap up a 25-year-old fugitive case.
And this is neither the beginning nor the end of my story.
